subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams pulled out of the Madrid Open on Monday after aggravating an injury to her right knee during a first-round match against Francesca Schiavone. The second-seeded Williams retired after losing the first set, 6-4. She declined to detail the extent of the problem, but said it would not keep her out of the French Open, which begins May 24.
